availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel Z. Hutcheson (Logan County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Clendenon Hutcheson and Sarah Hutcheson. Married to Pauline B. Snodgrass Hutcheson in 1857. Father of Samuel Clendenon Hutcheson, William Hutcheson, and John G. Hutcheson. Resident of Logan County in 1850. Farmer in Logan County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850),Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 34. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 45. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Fillmore, p. 35. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), Microfilm rolls #994027-994058, Logan County, 1857, Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky. Find A Grave, "Samuel Zebulon Hutcheson (1833-1910)," Memorial #87678095, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/87678095/samuel-zebulon-hutcheson (accessed May 28, 2017).
